tool_description: Generate questions from articles either by url or raw text
name: Artiquery
title: Artiquery

api_list.name: Question Generation
api_list.description: Generates questions from a given article
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artiquery.p.rapidapi.com/questions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artiquery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://artiquery.p.rapidapi.com/questions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artiquery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
